title: "What is the 'circolazione della luce' technique and how does it bring clarity to the mind?"
first_phrase: This text discusses the concept of "vang" or light and how it relates to the direction of the soul towards the external world. The previous tokens speak of the importance of strengthening and preserving one's inner castle to regain power and control. In the last 200 tokens, the focus is on the technical process of "inversion, circulation, and crystallization of light" to achieve a state of clarity of mind. The key to this process is to allow the light of seeing and understanding to rotate inward, and the way to achieve this is through stillness of mind and extreme mental clarity. The text emphasizes the importance of focusing on the auditory sense to allow the light to shine inward.

Una volta affermato il potere centrale, tutti i capi rivo * luzionari verranno a trovarsi con le loro lance ritorte contro loro * stessi e da lui riceveranno gli ordini >>. ________________ 378 IL FIORE D'ORO DEL GRANDE UNO Materiale protetto da copyright luce su sé stessa e all'origine, appunto come in un circolo:che la luce, intesa come unità di vedere-intendere (luce vi siva + luce auricolare), si raccolga ed illumini ora l'inter no, rotando su sé stessa (' ). La via la si trova per mezzo della « calma più profonda e dell'estrema chiarezza di men te » (p. 104). « Occorre che non vi sia moto nella mente » (p. 131). La « chiave magica » è indicata con questi termi ni espressivi: « Non si deve che far cadere, lievissimamente. luce sull'udito ».
last_phrase: In conclusion, by strengthening and preserving the original castle, it is like having a wise and powerful sovereign on the throne. The key to finding the path is through deeper calm and extreme clarity of mind. It is achieved by "crystallizing the light" and allowing it to circulate within ourselves, leading to the contemplation of every thought and redirecting the "intellectual light" onto ourselves. This is not rigid thinking, but listening and seeing every thought as it arises and ends.
